column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Entrees: The best steak is the bone-in 42-day dry-aged ribeye because it's sooo rich & cooked perfectly
column2: and the buttery bernajse sauce complements it so well (though it's great just with the salt rub!). If ribeye isn't your thing
column3: the filet is so tender you can cut with a butter knife. My favorite sides are the button mushrooms
column5: or pomme frites with super-rich garlic aioli. I've never had dessert but I'm sure they are divine!
